title: Beneath the Southern Cross
summary:
And epic story of three generations in Australia, beginning with a young man transported there as a felon and continuing to modern times. "(He) fathers a dynasty that will last beyond two hundred years. His descendants play their part in the forging of a nation, but internal strife and the privileges of wealth see an irreparable rift in the family. 

Driven by passion, greed and prejudice, this rift will echo through generations."
story_arc:
An initial rise in good fortunes, followed
                    by a setback, but a happy ending
